hymn.title: Lord, in Thy Spirit, take and fill my heart

layout.singingstanza: Lord, in Thy Spir -- it, take and fill my heart; Wean it from earth, through all its puls -- es move; In -- to my spir -- it all Thy grace im -- part, And make me love Thee as I ought to love.

lyrics.stanza: I ask no dream, no prophet ecstasies, No sudden rending of the veil of clay, No angel visitant, no opening skies; But take the dimness of my soul away.
Hast Thou not bid us love Thee, God and King? All, all Thine own—soul, heart and strength and mind. I see Thy cross—there teach my heart to cling. Oh, let me seek Thee, and, oh, let me find.
Teach me to love Thee with a virgin love, One holy passion filling all my frame; Thus all the riches of Thyself to prove, My heart an altar, and Thy love the flame.
